title: M/T CONSTELLATION - INQUIRY FOR ANY KIND OF SUPPLY OR REPAIR JOB REQUISITION IN CHITTAGONG & MONGLA PORT, BANGLADESH.
content:
Dear Sir/Mam

Greetings of the day,

We are pleased to introduce "Chittagong Marine Supplier & Services" as a leading ship supplier based in Chittagong/Mongla Port, Bangladesh.

With a strong focus on providing exceptional service and high-quality products, we cater to the diverse needs of vessels calling at these ports. Short Description of our services. 

 ◉ Ships Supply Services; Provisions, Technical, Spare Parts And Stores.  ◉ Owners and Charterers Protective Services.  ◉ Delivery Of Crew Mail & Courier Packages.  ◉ Bunker, Fuels, Lubricants And Fresh Water Supply.  ◉ Crew Changes, Hotel Accommodations, Shore Pass Arrangements Etc.  ◉ Crew Welfare–Doctor, Dentist, eMail, Internet, Mobile Prepaid Cards.  ◉ Underwater Inspection At Anchorage.  ◉ Internet Protocol (IP) Configuration Services.  ◉ CCTV Camera Installation And Repair Services.  ◉ Information Technology (IT) Installation and Repair Services.  ◉ Follow-Up Activities With Workshops, Contractors Etc.  ◉ Ship Spare Parts Clearance And Delivery ◉ Cash To Master Deliveries.  ◉ Inward & Outward Clearance ◉ Liaison With Local Authorities.  ◉ Supervision Services ◉ Communication Assistance.  ◉ Tug and Barge Arrangements ◉ Motor Boat Services.

Agency Services : 

* Vessel agent, Port agent, Trump & Liner & OPA-  * Specialized for Ownership/ Class/ Flag Change-  * Heavy Lift/ Project Cargo Handling-  * Lighter/ Barge supplier-  * Berthing management-  * Dry dock support-  * Ship Chartering-  * Cargo Handling-  * Arrangement of conditional surveys, on/off hire surveys, and cargo surveyors-

If you need any kinds of service OR emergency support in Bangladesh, Please inform with us without any hesitation.

//We are waiting for your kind reply//

Rk Rezaul-Rakib__Director, Chittagong Marine Supplier & Services,

MOB: +88 01632306505 (Urgent WhatsApp/ WeChat) Office: Rahman Villa 2nd Floor,Boropole,Halishahar. chittagong-4216,Bangladesh E-Mail: chittagongmarine.mgt@gmail.com E-Mail: chittagongmarine.serv@gmail.com E-Mail: chittagongmarine.supply@gmail.com

title: mailの送信が出来ない
content:
メッセージを送信できませんでした。送信（SMTP）サーバーmail.urara-kmd.jpとの接続がタイムアウトしたため、メッセージの送信できませんでした。再度試してくださいとメッセージが出ます。

アカウント設定で確認していますが、設定は何も変わっていないようです。
creator: linkizumi

title: Download all attachments function not working
content: Overnight my PC had a normal software update. Since then, when I click the arrow symbol to download all attachments, nothing happens. The only way to download attachments now is to click the magnifying glass, then save. For my work I need to download multiple attachments from multiple emails a day so it's pretty inconvenient.

title: Thunderbird on Chromebook not connecting with Gmail server.
content: I use TB with Gmail accounts on a PC without problems. Recently acquired a Chromebook and installed Linux version of TB. TB finds my existing Gmail IMAP configuration, but is unable to connect to the server. I'm entering my Gmail email address and the password saved in TB password manager on my PC. FYI, I am visually impaired (20/400) and it's difficult to research the issue, so any help or leads to a solution would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.
creator: gilsmith42

title: 在thunderbird中添加outlook邮箱，提示需要输入密码
content:
我在outlook中开启了无密码模式，通过authenticator验证。然后我在thunderbird中添加outlook邮箱时，通过authenticator验证以后，接下来就提示请输入邮箱账户密码。但是我的邮箱已经没有密码了。当我把authenticator关闭掉，改成密码模式以后，我在thunderbird输入密码后，提示 验证失败。请检查用户名和密码 。

之前有一次我在添加邮箱的时候，界面突然卡住，那个加载中的⭕一直在旋转，我等了很久都没反应。然后我就强制关闭了thunderbird，后续我再添加邮箱到thunderbird中的时候，就出现如上的错误了。
creator: layjeme

title: Recente emails niet zichtbaar in zoekresultaten
content:
Sinds 25 augustus worden emails van daarna niet meer weergegeven in de zoekresultaten. Gemaakte afspraken van de afgelopen week zijn daardoor moeilijk terug te vinden.

Ik vermoed door een update die op 22 augustus heeft plaatsgevonden, voor het weekend. Is er een instelling die ik zou kunnen controleren? Of is er een patch? (Versie 140.2.0esr (32-bits) is momenteel geïnstalleerd.)
creator: info5666

title: issues with folders syncing
content:
I have two laptops with Thunderbird on them for my email. One laptop works perfectly, but today, one of my laptops had only one email in the sent folder. the inbox is fine. There is also nothing in the trash. I have compared the settings on both laptops and in the copies and folders the only difference was that the place a copy in was highlighted as "other" in the laptop that have a version of thunderbird that was working properly.

I changed the settings to other on the laptop that wasn't working and it didn't fix the issue and sync the folders. I then unisntalled Thunderbird and reinstalled it and checked that the changes I had made were still there and they were. However, the sent folder only has two emails in it, the first one I saw this morning from a week ago and the one I sent today. I send around ten emails a day so it is very strange that there is only one email from the 29th of July.

Does anyone know how I fix this issue so that the folders are syncing properly?

Both laptops are using windows 11 and and thunderbird 142.0
creator: Christine42

title: Thunderbird instellingen overzetten naar android
content: Bij het overzetten van Thunderbird accounts van desktop naar mobiel merkte ik dat de map 'verzonden' niet overgezet wordt naar mobiel. Op mobiel verschijnt wel een map 'Sent' maar daar staan helemaal geen emails in. Werkt dit alleen goed in de engelstalige versie?

title: 「サーバーとの接続がリセットされました」
content: 詳しくないのでどなたか御指南頂ければ幸いです。 本日急に「サーバーとの接続がリセットされました」となりサンダーバードが反応しなくなりました。 ＰＣの電源ボタンから更新して再起動を押したあとに発生したように感じています。 （再起動前にサンダーバードを起動した訳ではないので確実ではありませんが） どのように対応したら良いのかまったくわからないので助けてください。 必要な情報があればご指摘ください。

title: I can no longer add my Gmail account
content: I can no longer add my Gmail account to Thunderbird (which I used to do in a previous installation). Version 140.2.0esr on Ubuntu 24.04. I tried a number of times, and it fails systematically with an “Authentication error” message in the account configuration window. When I add the account, the authorization request window from Google opens, asking me to give my password one time, then it continues normally, one time sending the authorization request to my phone, which I confirm, sometimes not. Each time, whatever the steps, even after a successful confirmation with the phone, I receive this same error. On the other end, the synchronization does function with Google Calendar, and I could reconnect it without problem after trying to change my Google password ­— using the same credentials. I tried deleting the registered password and trying again with no success so far.
creator: silvain

title: Tunderbird Desktop 142 stopped working with Yahoo Mail
content: Hello, Tunderbird Desktop stopped receiving emails with Yahoo Mail POP account around August 27th. Sending emails works fine. Using Tunderbird v142. Until August 27th it was fine, and then it just stopped. I use also Tunderbird Android which works just fine, but I use IMAP with it... Any info about Yahoo POP mail server changes or problems? Thank you. John
creator: ivog11000

title: Keyboard shortcuts for Folder modes
content:
Are there any keyboard shortcuts for folder modes? For example, I normally only have "Favorite Folders" displayed but then I suddenly need access to a folder that isn't a favorite. Currently, it needs 3 mouse clicks to go and turn on "All folders" - and another three to turn them of again afterwards. It would be much easier if there was a "Toggle showing 'All Folders'" shortcut???

Thanks
creator: sgoodwin
